description: Bernard Preynat was found guilty of abusing dozens of children in the 1970s, 1980s and 1990s.
title: Church sexual abuse: French priest jailed for five years
title_page: Church sexual abuse: French priest jailed for five years - BBC News
maintext: Mr Barbarin has admitted he had known of "rumours" about Preynat as far back as 2010, but that he only became aware of abuse after a conversation with a victim in 2014. He later informed the Vatican of the allegations, and removed Preynat from his position - but never informed police.
